alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 8:37PM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee affecting Marion and Florence Counties. For the Great Pee Dee River...including Pee Dee...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flood waters will affect swamplands and logging interests. Flood waters will affect timberland as far downstream as Yauhannah two weeks after the crest passes Pee Dee. Logging equipment needs to be moved. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 21.0 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Monday morning.
